subsection.name: Tutorial Objective
subsection.p: The objective of this tutorial is to demonstrate the usage of the -version option when building multiple projects.

subsection.name: Executing a versioned build
subsection.p: By default the build system assigns the version identifier of SNAPSHOT.
We can override this using the -version commandline option.
